Martlets Hospice have an urgent request - their clinical team need support with the following Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
They need donations of surgical masks, gloves and gowns.
They need disposable plastic aprons.
They need any face masks to help support the delivery of their care.
They need tympanic (ear) thermometer disposable probe covers â€“ universal or to suit Braun models.
Any spare thermometers you have would also be very helpful.
If you are able to help, please contact them by calling 01273 273400 FAO Graham Turner.

ğŸ’™ Albion have ring-fenced a minimum of one thousand tickets covering future matches to be donated to front line nhs.uk heroes fighting the coronavirus.

ğŸ† Albion will host Birmingham City in the Women's FA Cup quarter-finals, should they get past Crystal Palace in the fifth round.
Hope Powell's side will travel to Hayes Lane for their rearranged fifth round tie next Tuesday, with Marta Tejedor's side awaiting the victors.
Albion's match against Palace on Sunday was postponed due to the adverse weather conditions, and the game has been rearranged for Tuesday 25th February, kick-off 7.30pm.
The quarter-final ties are scheduled to take place on Sunday 15th March.
Further information, including ticket details for the game, should it materialise, will be confirmed in due course.

ğŸ—“ï¸ Monday 17th April 2017 - Albion 2-1 Wigan Athleticï¿½ï¿½
Albion secured promotion to the Premier League thanks to goals from Glenn Murray and Solly March. Jubilant celebrations followed after the full-time whistle.ï¿½ï¿½
Your favourite Amex league game?
#BHAFC ğŸ”µâšªï¸

ğŸ—“ï¸ Friday 20th January 2017 - Albion 2-1 Sheffield Wednesdayï¿½ï¿½
David Stockdale produced a fine double save from Fernando Forestieriâ€™s penalty, after Glenn Murray had been sent off, and Anthony Knockaert fired the winning goal.
Your favourite Amex league game?
#BHAFC ğŸ”µâšªï¸

ğŸ—“ï¸ Saturday 29th October 2016 - Albion 5-0 Norwich City.

ğŸ—“ï¸ Saturday 5th December 2015 - Albion 3-2 Charlton Athletic

ï¿½ï¿½Your favourite Amex league game?

ğŸ—“ï¸ Saturday 21st February 2015 - Albion 4-3 Birmingham City.
